categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Remembrance was an EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate active within the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. Prior to the Battle of Endor, it was commanded by Captain Volk Aymeric and served as the lead vessel in a convoy of ships that protected Princess Leia Organa, one of the leaders of the Alliance.
